mapper.select: select mark from t_mark where user_id = ${userId} and type = ${type};

SELECT user_id, video_type FROM ( SELECT user_id, video_type, mark, IF(@prev_user = user_id, @rank := @rank + 1, @rank := 1) AS rank, @prev_user := user_id FROM (SELECT * FROM t_mark ORDER BY user_id, mark DESC) AS sorted_data JOIN (SELECT @prev_user := 0, @rank := 0) AS vars ) ranked_videos WHERE rank <= 4;
select video_type from t_mark where user_id = ${userId}
